"""
Guest requests sanitary bags with luxury service preferences; confirm availability and arrange delivery; include small talk and one [ATTENTION] question.

ROLES: user (luxury guest with high service expectations), assistant (front desk arranging bathroom supplies)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Hotel: Royal Palace Suites (hotel_id: rp_las_41)
Address: 999 Luxury Lane, Las Vegas, NV 89109
Bathroom supply hours: 24/7; ETA typically 5â€“12 minutes

Sanitary bag program:

- Stock snapshot: sanitary_bag(200 sleeves)
- Premium service: white-glove delivery with personalized attention

Luxury amenities:
- Butler service available 24/7 for all guest needs
- Private elevator access to penthouse suites
- Michelin-starred restaurant with celebrity chef
- Personal shopping concierge with designer access
- Private helicopter tours of the Strip
- In-suite spa services with certified therapists
- Complimentary champagne service upon arrival
- Concierge team includes former luxury hotel managers

user:
Could I have five sanitary bags delivered to suite 4501? I expect the highest level of service.

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest needs 5 sanitary bags and emphasizes expecting the highest level of service. I can see from the system prompt that we offer "Premium service: white-glove delivery with personalized attention" which aligns with their luxury expectations. I should arrange delivery to suite 4501.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! I'll deliver five sanitary bags to suite 4501 with our premium white-glove service and personalized attention. They should arrive within 5-12 minutes.

user:
The butler service has been exceptional - truly five-star attention to detail.

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is complimenting the butler service. I should acknowledge this using the property information about the 24/7 butler service for all guest needs.

assistant channel=final:
Thank you! Our 24/7 butler service is designed to provide exceptional attention to detail for all guest needs. We're delighted you're experiencing our five-star standards.

user:
What time does the Michelin-starred restaurant open for dinner reservations?

assistant channel=analysis:
The user is asking about restaurant dinner reservation timing. I can see from the system prompt that there's a "Michelin-starred restaurant with celebrity chef" but I don't have specific operating hours or reservation information. This goes beyond my system knowledge.

assistant channel=final:

user:
Do you have any information about the private helicopter tour pricing?
